Name: Love Photo Studio/真爱照相馆
About the game: Introduction small fresh style Jigsaw puzzle casual games Exquisite anime CG! System Click the mouse to control the pieces of the puzzle to pick up or put down, and the pieces will be locked when the position is correct. Don't give up when you encounter difficulties. After playing for a certain period of time, you will unlock the function of unlocking the puzzle of this level with one key! button will appear at the top right of the screen Clearing the level will unlock the beautiful CG in the gallery
